body:
finally a fellow chemist who talks about real science shiz.
her hypothesis  is correct the perfume's formula is made out of carbondioxeds that make molecular connections with the oxygen in the receptors area thus leading it to reach to the brain blood vessel and it successfully and easily passes the bbb ( brain blood blockade ) thus making it all the way up to the dopamine molecule releaser and corrupting it.
( ez biochem).
its sexy when she talks science uwu
